title: Help! I Wrecked My House (New Episode)
overview: Home renovation expert and HGTV star Jasmine Roth comes to the rescue of overzealous do-it-yourselfers in the new series, Help! I Wrecked My House, the HGTV series showcases Jasmine and her team as they redeem failed home improvement projects and customize the new spaces with beautiful, functional design tailored to each client.
